column4: I also like to have a squence in gnome starter-menu - |killall firefox; firefox -p default --restart > /dev/null 2>&1& |
why nothing is executed? All commands work on the commandline.
o.k. thanks, I put "badfox" in a script now  and starting this worked. (I's strange anyway that there Alt-F2 and Gnome-Starters have these restrictions...)
